product_name: The North Face Perrito Reversible Insulated Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The North Face Reversible Perrito insulated jacket cuddles toddlers as they get an early start to a long life of outdoor adventure. Recycled polyester shell with Durable Water Repellent finish reverses from a solid color to a fun polka-dot print; polyester fiber insulation adds warmth. Hood with elastic binding offers added warmth. Chin guard at the top of the zipper protects young skin. The North Face Reversible Perrito insulated jacket features zippered hand pockets and elastic binding at the cuffs and hem.
short_description: The North Face Reversible Perrito insulated jacket cuddles toddlers as they get an early start to a long life of outdoor adventure.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Insulated Parkas And Pants
